name: HOPPER (ASH's GAME-WAREHOUSE)
description:
Hey there everyone, thanks for stopping by at my page. I'm happy to release my first ever platformer made with SDL2 for the "BEDROOM PROGRAMMERS JAM VOL2".

This is a simple platformer about a grasshopper. Collect all the keys in-game to proceed to the next level.

Controls:

D/right-arrow = move forward
A/left-arrow = move back
S/down-arrow = hop low
SPACE = shoot

ESC = pause
M = mute background music

Please do let me know if you encounter any bugs in-game so that i can fix it and learn from my mistakes :) .
